attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: social services are not fit for purpose,they steal children from their parents when not needed and do nothing when it is needed. they are unaccountable for their actions,they lie and fabricate evidence to gain their results. they abuse their authority and use the police as their puppets. they also hide behind family (kangaroo) courts.these so-called written agreements should also be scraped.
